text: kaho, "tumhen aakaash aur dharatee se rozee kaun deta hai, ya ye kaan aur aankhen kisake adhikaar mein hai aur kaun jeevant ko nirjeev se nikaalata hai aur nirjeev ko jeevant se nikaalata hai aur kaun yah saara intizaam chala raha hai?" isapar ve bol padege, "allaah!" to kaho, "phir aakhir tum kyon nahin dar rakhate
